subject: Re: Website Icons Update
preview: Morning Heath,  Thanks so much.  Best, Sophie

full_threads.body:
Hi Sophie, 

We have now made all of the update as sent through on the word document and in the subsequent emails. 

Here are the links to the icons in the backends of their respective sites: 

https://msra.org.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=box
https://mstrials.org.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=box
https://msbrainbank.org.au/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=box

Hi Sophie, 

Sure, thanks for your patience. The MS Brain Bank website is updated and we are working on the other two sites today. I will keep you updated.

Hi Heath,

Hope you're having a good week.

Just wanted to check in on the below and see how the updates are coming along?

Thanks

Sophie

Hi again Heath,

One more update from me:

For the image below, can we update to 2020 data:

Developing Better Treatments: 16

Cure for MS Via Repair or Regeneration of Cells: 2

Cause and Prevention: 1



Thank you!

Sophie

Hi Heath, Thanks so much 😊 Here's a few more details to add to the Kiss Goodbye to MS icons (bold info is new):
  • In 2019, Kiss Goodbye to MS raised over $2,958,000 AUD globally. (MSIF provided Euro figure of 1,701,500, I just did the conversion online).
  • Kiss Goodbye to MS is now operating in 14 countries. (This is the 2020 figure, for 2019 it would be 13 countries)
Thanks! Sophie Sophie Hodge Digital Marketing Coordinator MS Research Australia 02 8413 7930 • 1300 356 467 shodge@msra.org.au• http://www.msra.org.au/ Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

Thanks for sending this through Sophie, we will work through the task and update you once it's ready for review. 

You will hear back from us toward the end of the week.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Hope you’re well.

We need to update the website icons with info and stats from 2019.

I am waiting on a few more details to come through, but if you could get started on these ones attached that would be great.

There are a few more down the bottom which would be great to add from last year’s May 50K.
If you could mock up something and send it back to me?

Let me know if you have any further questions!

Thanks so much.

Sophie




<https://msra.org.au/>
Sophie Hodge
Digital Marketing Coordinator
MS Research Australia
02 8413 7930 • 1300 356 467
shodge@msra.org.au <mailto:shodge@msra.org.au> • www.msra.org.au <http://www.msra.org.au/>
Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060
